autoScalingEnabled.description: Describes whether the Kinesis Data Analytics service can increase the parallelism of the application in response to increased throughput.

configurationType.description: Describes whether the application uses the default parallelism for the Kinesis Data Analytics service. Valid values: `CUSTOM`, `DEFAULT`. Set this attribute to `CUSTOM` in order for any specified `auto_scaling_enabled`, `parallelism`, or `parallelism_per_kpu` attribute values to be effective.

parallelism.description: Describes the initial number of parallel tasks that a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application can perform.

parallelismPerKpu.description: Describes the number of parallel tasks that a Flink-based Kinesis Data Analytics application can perform per Kinesis Processing Unit (KPU) used by the application.
